title: Laceration care

fields.name: tetanus
fields.label: Tetanus advice
fields.default: Your tetanus status was reviewed today.

body:
You were treated today for a laceration.

Closure: {{closure_type}}.

Keep the wound clean and dry for 24 hours. After that, you may gently wash and pat dry.

{{#if suture_removal}}Suture removal: {{suture_removal}}.

{{/if}}{{#if tetanus}}Tetanus advice: {{tetanus}}

{{/if}}Return to ED or see your GP urgently if you develop:
- Increasing redness, swelling, or pus
- Fever or worsening pain
- Wound edges opening

Arrange follow-up for wound review if needed.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
